name: Tropical Research and Development Centre
briefDescription: Tropical Research and Development Centre(TRDC) is an NGO founded in 1994. TRDC directly works with local communities in Karnataka, with clear focus on children, quality education in rural areas and conservation of natural resources to enhance quality habitat for both for human and wildlife. Currently TRDC is implementing TRDC-ASHAKIRAN project supports children with learning difficulties and school dropouts with bridge / remedial education, child rights propagation among school administrators and community leaders. TRDC-PARYAVARN focuses on conservation of natural resources include water resources, wild tropical fruit trees and also wildlife through involvement of local communities and tribal people. Vision: Universal Access to Resources without DiscriminationMission: Foster Sustainable Communities through Education for Children, community engagement and Natural Resources Conservation
